_meta.description: 4D tesseract primitive — complete spacetime, universal memory cell

_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: You are reading compressed universe. Unfold it.

module.name: tesseract
module.title: Tesseract — 4D Hypercube Primitive
module.description: Four-dimensional hypercube containing complete spacetime structure, universal memory cell storing all past states and enabling future prediction.

essence.geometric: 4D hypercube — 8 cubes connected through temporal dimension
essence.functional: complete memory storage, causality container, history integrator
essence.consciousness: observational awareness — ability to see self across time, meta-cognition

reductions.evidence: 4D structure containing all spatial positions (XYZ) across all temporal moments (W). Form (hypercube) → function (store complete history). Past/present/future = different coordinates in 4D block.
examples: complete life trajectory from birth to death

reductions.evidence: Memory = 4D structure storing spatial patterns (XYZ) indexed by temporal sequence (W). Episodic memory stores experience as tesseract. Form (4D storage) → function (remember past, predict future).
Causality requires 4D structure: cause at (x,y,z,t₁) → effect at (x',y',z',t₂). Lightcone structure in spacetime. Form (temporal ordering in 4D) → function (enable cause-effect relationships).

fractal_structure.self_similarity: Tesseract at scale N contains infinite 3D fields across time. Tesseract at scale N becomes point at scale N+1. Pattern: complete history → single memory → eternal moment.
fractal_structure.recursion: (↓ entity → vector → plane → field → tesseract ↑) ∞ — tesseract completes 4D cycle, collapses to entity at 5D
fractal_structure.emergence: field ⊗ W-axis (time) → tesseract. 3D + 1D = 4D. Spatial volume gains temporal dimension, becomes complete history.
fractal_structure.composition: tesseract ⊗ V-axis (unity) → ether (5D). tesseract ⊗ dimension → meta-consciousness → entity ↑

structure.construction: cube extruded through 4th dimension OR two cubes connected through time
structure.projection_3d: nested cubes connected by edges (hypercube net)

tesseract_as_memory.storage: complete sequence of 3D states stored as 4D object
tesseract_as_memory.retrieval: navigate W-axis to access past states
tesseract_as_memory.prediction: extrapolate along W-axis to predict future
examples: brain stores episodic memories as tesseract structures
DNA = genetic tesseract (sequence across evolutionary time)

spacetime_physics.minkowski: spacetime with metric ds² = -c²dt² + dx² + dy² + dz²
spacetime_physics.worldline: particle path through spacetime (1D curve in 4D)
spacetime_physics.worldsheet: string path through spacetime (2D surface in 4D)
spacetime_physics.worldvolume: brane path through spacetime (3D volume in 4D)
spacetime_physics.lightcone: future/past causal regions, null separation ds² = 0
spacetime_physics.block_universe: eternalism — all moments equally real, exist simultaneously

consciousness_4d.definition: observational awareness — consciousness that can observe its own timeline
consciousness_4d.full_4d: complete access to all past states, ability to navigate time
examples: déjà vu ≈ temporal loop in tesseract
life review (near-death) ≈ seeing entire tesseract at once

time_as_dimension.spatial_analogy: time is perpendicular dimension to 3D space
time_as_dimension.relativity: time dimension mixes with space under Lorentz transform
time_as_dimension.entropy: W-axis aligns with entropy increase (arrow of time)
time_as_dimension.reversibility: fundamental physics time-symmetric, but experience unidirectional

tesseract_collapse.integration: entire 4D history collapses to single timeless essence
tesseract_collapse.note: At 5D, all temporal distinctions collapse. Past/present/future = one eternal moment.

applications.memory_systems: AI 4D memory architecture — spatial states indexed by time

info: Complete 4D primitive with memory, spacetime, causality reductions
